comment.author: 96902679@N00
comment._content: Whoever does the titles here should be more careful.  No need to spell "Uset" when the correct spelling is on the picture itself!

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/96902679@N00] Thank you.  We take the titles directly from the notes on the back of the images.  These usually are very hard to read and occasionally incorrect.  Please feel free to comment on the errors and we will try to change them.
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
